data.title: Niklas Luhmann
data.meta_description: Niklas Luhmann (December 8, 1927 – November 6, 1998) was a German sociologist, philosopher of social science, and a prominent thinker in systems theory. He's considered one of the most important social theorists of the 20th century and the creator …
data.text: Niklas Luhmann (December 8, 1927 – November 6, 1998) was a German sociologist, philosopher of social science, and a prominent thinker in systems theory.
